definition: to scare/to intimidate/to threaten/(interjection showing disapproval) tut-tut/(interjection showing astonishment)

sentences.english: There will be no threats and minatory actions.
sentences.chinese: 我們不會採取威脅和恫嚇的行爲。

sentences.english: Between countries trade is often a great bludgeon.
sentences.chinese: 在國家之間，貿易經常是達的恫嚇手段。

sentences.english: Whoever killed these individuals wanted to intimidate survivors as well, he asserts.
sentences.chinese: 他斷言，殺死這些人的兇手還意圖籍此恫嚇倖存者。

sentences.english: Sanshui found YiHeng unexpectedly speak tried to commit suicide, unbearable speak intimidation him.
sentences.chinese: 三水發現乙恆竟說出想自殺後，忍不住出言恫嚇他。

sentences.english: Their threats proved to be hollow.
sentences.chinese: 他們的威脅後來證明全是虛聲恫嚇。

sentences.english: Their mail was being packed with importuning or threatening letters.
sentences.chinese: 他們的信箱裏充滿了提出強硬要求和恫嚇的信。

sentences.english: Some U. S. politicians paint China to be a saber-rattling belligerent.
sentences.chinese: 一些美國政客塗飾中國是武力恫嚇的好戰國家。

sentences.english: We can huff, puff and blow the paper boats across.
sentences.chinese: 我們可以恫嚇，喘氣摘要船穿越。

sentences.english: She blustered out what she would do if she caught me.
sentences.chinese: 她恫嚇說，如果她抓住我，她會怎麼辦。

sentences.english: You can intimidate your foe with the bayonet mounted.
sentences.chinese: 你可以裝好刺刀後恫嚇你的仇家。

sentences.english: It growls not to threaten, but to summon.
sentences.chinese: 他的咆哮並非恫嚇，而是召集。

sentences.english: I thought the veiled threat of war was bluff .
sentences.chinese: 我認爲那含蓄的戰爭恫嚇是嚇唬人的。

sentences.english: Joey Yung was once arrested in relation to a case of threat.
sentences.chinese: 容祖兒曾因涉及一宗恫嚇案而被拘捕。

definition: to rise in revolt/to raise difficult questions
to criticize (as a matter of principle)
to denounce/to condemn/to call to account/to punish
variant of 誣衊|诬蔑[wu1 mie4]
to forfeit sovereignty and humiliate the country (idiom)/to surrender territory under humiliating terms
to condemn in speech and in writing (idiom)/to denounce by word and pen
Liuying township in Tainan county 台南縣|台南县[Tai2 nan2 xian4], Taiwan
